name: SPLATIMUS
description:
You are a paintball with a colorful attitude. 

Each level starts out black.  As you move and jump, paint is splattered all over, revealing the floors, walls, obstacles, etc.

Try to solve the levels in record time while avoiding spikes, enemies, and all sorts of colorful pitfalls! 

Happy splattering!

Credit to freeSFX for some of the music and sound files:  http://www.freesfx.co.uk
